com.globalscalingsoftware.prefdialog
Interface FieldHandler<FieldComponentType extends FieldComponent>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFieldHandler
public interface FieldHandler<FieldComponentType extends FieldComponent>

Setups and Handles outside messages to the underlying FieldComponent.

Method Summary
 void applyInput(java.lang.Object parent)
          Apply the user input.
 java.awt.Component getAWTComponent()
          Returns the AWT Component which can be added to a swing container.

          Returns the value of the component.

          Restore the value after the user entered some input.

Method Detail

setup

void setup()
Setup the underlying FieldComponent.

setComponentWidth

void setComponentWidth(double width)
Sets the width of the component, as specified by the width annotation type element.

setComponentName

void setComponentName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the name of the component. The name will be used to identify the component.

setComponentTitle

void setComponentTitle(java.lang.String title)
Sets the title of the component. The title will either be used as text for the component's label.

setComponentValue

void setComponentValue(java.lang.Object value)
Sets the value of the component. The value must be the same type (or can be casts/parsed into) as the type of the attribute which this component represents.

getComponentValue

java.lang.Object getComponentValue()
Returns the value of the component. After the call of applyInput(Object) it should return the new value. After the call of restoreInput(Object) it should return the old value.

getAWTComponent

java.awt.Component getAWTComponent()
Returns the AWT Component which can be added to a swing container.

applyInput

void applyInput(java.lang.Object parent)
Apply the user input.

Parameters:
parent - the parent object to which this component belongs to.

restoreInput

void restoreInput(java.lang.Object parent)
Restore the value after the user entered some input.

Parameters:
parent - the parent object to which this component belongs to.
